i-homologous: IiChromosomes ezifanayo ngenkangeleko kwaye ziphethe imfuza yeempawu ezifanayo
meiosis: Inkqubo yokwahlulwa kweeseli evelisa iigeyithi (amadlozi neqanda) ezinesiqingatha senani leechromosome njengeseli engumzali.
imitosis: Inkqubo yokwahlulwa kweeseli evelisa iiseli ezintsha ezinenani elifanayo leechromosome njengeseli yomzali
ikaryotyping: Ukuhlalutya iichromosome zomntu ukuchonga izinto ezingaqhelekanga
phenotype: Iimpawu eziqaphelekayo zezinto eziphilayo, ezigqitywe yi-genotype kunye nokusingqongileyo
ukongamela: I-Allele evala imiphumo ye-allele ephindaphindayo xa ikhona kwichromosome efanayo
ukugqithisela: I-allele egqunywe yi-allele elawulayo xa ikhona kwichromosome enye
punnett square: Umzobo osetyenziselwa ukuqikelela ukuba kunokwenzeka ukuba abantwana bafumane ilifa iimpawu ezithile
iteknoloji yebhayoloji: Ukusetyenziswa kwezinto eziphilayo okanye iimveliso zabo ukuguqula okanye ukudala iimveliso ezintsha okanye iinkqubo
gmo: Isishunqulelo esinikwe izinto eziphilayo ezinemizila yemfuza iye yatshintshwa ngendlela engenzekiyo ngokwemvelo.
amayeza okubulala iintsholongwane: Into ebulala okanye inqanda ukukhula kweebhaktheriya
intsholongwane: I-ejenti eyosulelayo ephindaphinda kuphela ngaphakathi kweeseli ze-host organism
isitofu sokugonya: Ukulungiswa kwezinto eziphilayo ezibonelela ngokukhuseleka kwisifo esithile
inkqubo ye-nervous: Uthungelwano lweeseli ezikhethekileyo ezisasaza ulwazi kuwo wonke umzimba
inkqubo ye-endocrine: Inkqubo yamadlala evelisa iihomoni ezilawula imisebenzi eyahlukeneyo yomzimba
inkqubo yokujikeleza kwegazi: Inkqubo yamalungu kunye nemithambo ehambisa igazi kuwo wonke umzimba
inkqubo yomzimba: Inkqubo yeeseli kunye namalungu akhusela umzimba kwizifo
ukuziqhelanisa nendaleko: Uphawu olunikezela ukuphila okanye inzuzo yokuzala kwinto ephilayo kwindawo yayo
speciation: Inkqubo apho uhlobo olutsha luvela kuhlobo olukhoyo
